Module se1.bestellsystem
Package system.impl

Class IoC_ContainerImpl

java.lang.Object
system.impl.IoC_ContainerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IoC
public final class IoC_ContainerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IoC
Implementation class of an "Inversion-of-Control" (IoC) container, which creates and holds system component objects.
Version:
"1.0.0-SNAPSHOT_D1"
Author:
"Khatia Zitanishvili"
